## 2. Calcule as derivadas das funções abaixo:

### 1. Regra da potência

$$
f(x) = 7x^7 + 6x^2 + 2x + 8
$$

$$
f'(x) = 7 \cdot 7x^6 + 2 \cdot 6x^1 + 2x^0 
$$
$$
f'(x) = 49x^6 + 12x + 2
$$

### 2. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \frac{8x^3 + x}{1+x^2}
$$

### 3. Regra da cadeia

$$
f(x) = \sin(7x^2+4)
$$

$$
f'(x) = \cos(7x^2+4) \cdot 14x
$$


### 4. TO DO
$$
f(x) = x^x
$$

### 5. TO DO
$$
f(x) = (x - x^3)^{\cos x}
$$

### 6. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \frac{1}{x} + \tan x + e^{x^2}
$$

### 7. Regra da cadeia
$$
f(x) = \sin(\cos x)
$$

$$
f'(x) = \cos(\cos x) \cdot (-\sin x)
$$

### 8. TO DO
$$
f(x) = x \cdot e^x \cdot \sin x
$$

### 9. TO DO
$$
f(x) = (\tan x)^{\ln(x^3+1)}
$$

### 10. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \tan 2x
$$

### 11. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \frac{\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x}}}{x}
$$


### 12. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \ln(8x^3+2x+1)
$$

### 13. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \frac{e^{2x}+\ln 7x + \cos 8x}{x^2+7}
$$

### 14. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \sqrt{x^2+x}
$$

### 15. TO DO
$$
f(x) = \frac{(x^2+1)(x^4+x)}{x^7+1}
$$

### 16. TO DO
$$
f(x) = |x| \cdot {x}
$$
